title: Link in PBE Email not working!
body:
Hi, so I recently received an email confirming that OI was accepted into the PBE. I was of course ecstatic becuase I've wanted to be on the PBE for a long while and I opened the email to find a link to create an account! 
https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe-signup
However, whenever I click the link, it just gives me a message saying:
ERROR: 500 Something has gone Hexagonally wrong. I checked the PBE client status and it says it's all fine. I've tried several times over the last few weeks to create my account but this always shows up!

Any help would be greatly appreciated! Thank you in advance!

replies.body: I am having the same issue as detailed here. The solution posited by Targon's Blade did not work for me.

Try [clearing your browser's cache](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies), then log in from the [NA Landing page](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/), and finally visit [this PBE link.](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe)

Let me know if this worked.
